984710.name: Mojo: Hanako - Collection Edition
984710.description:
If you enjoyed MOJO: Hanako and would like to add it to your game collection, please purchase the Collection Edition.

Warning: the DLC data do not contain game modifications nor additional materials. This DLC was created for linking the free game to the account.

Attention: The owners of the commercial version of MOJO do not need to purchase this DLC since it is already included in the base game.
984710.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 保加利亚语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 匈牙利语, 希腊语, 丹麦语, 繁体中文, 简体中文, 韩语, 荷兰语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 罗马尼亚语, 俄语, 泰语, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 芬兰语, 捷克语, 瑞典语, 日语, 越南语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
